roleset.name: to engage wholly or deeply, engulf completely
roleset.note: IMMERSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'immerse' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from immerse.01-v)
IMMERSION-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to immerse.01. Immerse.01 is a member of VN class put-9.1. Framed by Katie. (from immersion.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: That was followed [*-1] by three months at the Aetna Institute in Hartford , where she-2 was immersed [*-2]in [*] learning how [*-3] to read and interpret policies [*T*-4] .
example.arg: in [*] learning how [*-3]to read and interpret policies [*T*-4]

example.name: in a substance
example.text: Some insist on submersion or at least partial water immersion of the person who is baptized
example.arg: of the persion who is baptized.

example.name: in a topic
example.text: Immersion in a foreign language rewires your brain
